thread.title: Carol Ible

author: Carol Ible
title: Carol Ible
text: I've now completed 6 house sits since I began my journey. As I'm travelling and can't have animals it has allowed me to enjoy and spend time with Maxine, Mallory and Guinness, Zora and Banjo, Daisy and Martha, Beryl and Beano and of course the chooks. Families have been so welcoming and it is wonderful to know they trust me to look after their home and their animals.
